title: Capacity-Building Course for UDL-Based Secondary STEM Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of secondary education curriculum fundamentals and mastery of core mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Developing instructional design capabilities in BYOD environments, leveraging mobile devices and accommodating diverse learner types (e.g., visual, auditory, and motor-impaired individuals).

learning_goals: A mathematics instructional design document applying the three UDL principles (Representation, Action & Expression, Engagement) is developed
Mobile-friendly microlearning content reflecting diverse learner needs is developed
Existing STEM teaching materials are analyzed using UDL evaluation tools and improvement recommendations are provided
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
